issue.title: Logical camera detects models without collisions

content.raw: @chapulina if you're using logical cameras for SRC you should also beware of https://bitbucket.org/osrf/ariac/issues/44/logical-camera-can-see-through (don't think there's a gazebo issue open yet) and https://bitbucket.org/osrf/ariac/issues/54/logical-camera-reports-incorrect-transform (may be specific to ARIAC)
content.html: @chapulina if you're using logical cameras for SRC you should also beware of https://bitbucket.org/osrf/ariac/issues/44/logical-camera-can-see-through (don't think there's a gazebo issue open yet) and https://bitbucket.org/osrf/ariac/issues/54/logical-camera-reports-incorrect-transform (may be specific to ARIAC)
